text: To build    enduring relationships that promote advocacy and financial support    for UCLA.

UCLA External Affairs advances UCLA’s mission    of teaching, research and community service through a coordinated    campuswide communications, advocacy and development effort. The    common goal is to connect UCLA’s faculty, staff, students,    alumni and friends through strategies and programs designed to    build long-term relationships and support for the university.
Rhea Turteltaub's leadership as Vice Chancellor, UCLA External Affairs, began in April 2008.    She manages External Affairs with the help of a senior team and an executive support staff.
